hush.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to make someone stop shouting, talking, crying etc
hush.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Ella asked them to hush their voices.
hush.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The audience hushed as he stepped onto the stage.
hush.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used to tell people to be quiet, or to comfort a child who is crying or upset
hush.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Hush, now. Try to get to sleep.
hush.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a period of silence, especially when people are expecting something to happen
hush.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: A sudden hush fell over the crowd.
